accessibility.text: Kani is built on a \"batteries not included\" philosophy
Kani is built on a \"batteries not included\" philosophy
We implement the essential features with less library-specific tooling
Kani is built on a \"batteries not included\" philosophy
We implement the essential features with less library-specific tooling
Compare to \"batteries included\" libraries -- these libraries include integrations and default applications
But might be unstable across the long term for research applications
